com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice

Interface Query

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XMLSerializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdvancedSearchQueryTerm, BasicSearchQuery, CompoundSearchQuery

    public interface Query
extends XMLSerializable
    An interface that produces a common ancestor for various queries.

    A query will be one of:

    • A BasicSearchQuery
    • An AdvancedSearchQueryTerm
    • A CompoundSearchQuery containing any number of these three.

    • Method Detail

      • getExtendedOptionValue

        Object getExtendedOptionValue(String code)
        Get a specialized search option value.

        When a DatabaseService supplies extended search options from DatabaseService.getExtendedSearchOptions(boolean) the user may set those options from the search panel and those values can be retrieved from the query.

        Parameters:
        code - of extended option (ExtendedSearchOption.getCode())
        Returns:
        value of extended option. Value type depends on the option (boolean for checkbox, string for combobox etc). null if no such code or this query is not the root query.

      • isBrowse

        boolean isBrowse()
        Returns true if this is a browse query, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if this is a browse query
